description: Test suite for image processing and multimodal input handling in the agno project, using pytest to verify agent responses to images provided via URL, bytes, and file path, including a skipped test for tool-assisted image analysis.

methods.name: test_image_input
methods.description: Tests agent response to an image provided via URL and verifies message sequence.

methods.name: test_image_input_bytes
methods.description: Tests agent response to an image provided as byte content read from a file.

methods.name: test_image_input_local_file
methods.description: Tests agent response to an image provided via local file path.

methods.name: test_image_input_with_tool_call
methods.description: Skipped test for image input with tool call, intended to verify advanced image analysis.
